name: Sopa de puchero
description: /'Soup from puchero'/ The logical conclusion to every puchero, making soup from it.

ingredients: A few leaves of hierbahuerto (also called hierbabuena or menta spicata, a soft variety of mint)

instructions: - Remove tomatoes but get the juice from them. Slightly break the pieces of meat with your hands.
- Take to a simmer, add rice and count 20'
- Serve with a couple leaves of hierbahuerto

culinary: Hierbahuerto is optional really, but quite traditional in the Canaries.
serving: Serve with a lot of bread on the side, and/or a side dish.
